item.title: The Immediate Goodness of God
item.description:
The Immediate Goodness of God by Elder Kyle S. McKay, Of the Seventy given in Sunday Afternoon of 189th Annual General Conference on Sun Mar 31 2019
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: Elder Kyle S. McKay, Of the Seventy

item.title: The Man Who Communed with Jehovah
item.description:
The Man Who Communed with Jehovah by Elder Kyle S. McKay, Of the Seventy given in Saturday Evening of 194th Semiannual General Conference on Mon Sep 30 2024
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
